mapper.select:
SELECT seq as seq, ani as ani, description as description, connid as connid, bl_useyn as bl_useyn, agentid as agentid, degree as degree, crt_dt as crt_dt, crt_by as crt_by, upt_dt as upt_dt, upt_by as upt_by FROM givr.gr_ax_ivr_blackconsumer WHERE 1=1
AND ani LIKE '%' || #{ani} || '%'
ORDER BY seq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO givr.gr_ax_ivr_blackconsumer (seq, ani, description, connid, bl_useyn, agentid, degree, crt_dt, crt_by) VALUES (givr.gr_ax_ivr_blackconsumer_seq.nextval, #{ani}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bl_useyn}, #{agentid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree}, #{crt_dt}, #{crt_by})
mapper.update: UPDATE givr.gr_ax_ivr_blackconsumer SET description = #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, connid = #{connid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bl_useyn = #{bl_useyn}, agentid = #{agentid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree}, upt_dt = #{upt_dt}, upt_by = #{upt_by} WHERE seq = #{seq}
